actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the St. Joe River in Idaho as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain portions of the Saint Joe River in the vicinity of Saint Joe, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to administer the provisions of this Act. Authorizes to be appropriated up to $1,100,000 for the acquisition of lands or interests in lands for such river.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating the St. Joe River in Idaho as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
